name: Max Mix 3D
description:
Max Mix Game 3D is an unique isometric 3D view action pacman-like game, where you have a smoother than ever control over your Pac, and where you will face many challenging and surprising dangers:

  • Spooky ghosts that will haunt you
  • Skulls and Mummies that want to push you away
  • Frankies that will try to squeeze you out under their inexistent boots
  • Even some of the power pills will try to flee from you!

Be sure to check this PC version which we will be updating while development goes on, and where right now you can only play the first level of the game, but soon up to 6 crazy and beautiful levels will be available.

The game will be uploaded to the Play Store with an Android version as soon at it is stable enough, but for now I will post updates here, in this Windows compilation.

CONTROLS:

  • Gamepad / WASD / Arrows - Move the Pac
  • A or Y button / Spacebar / Ctrl - Jump
  • ESC - Exit game
